summary: The file defines a suite of unit tests for the service that flags workflow runs as late when they start after a configured time buffer. It includes helper factories to create runs with various timestamps and multiple test cases that verify nonâ€‘late conditions, proper late detection, handling of the buffer period, and idempotent processing of runs.
business_intent: Validate that the system correctly identifies and marks overdue workflow executions, supporting monitoring and alerting mechanisms for timely remediation of delayed runs.
